verses.verse: Set the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> to thy <S%H2441>mouth<s%>. As an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> he cometh against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, because they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H6586>trespassed<s%> against my <S%H8451>law<s%>.
They <S%H3478><s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, My God, we Israel know <S%H3045>thee<s%>.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath cast <S%H2186>off<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%>: the <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall pursue <S%H7291>him<s%>.

They have set up <S%H4427>kings<s%>, but not by <S%H7786>me<s%>; they have made princes, and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it <S%H3701>not<s%>: of their silver and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> have they <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H6091>idols<s%>, that they may be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

He hath <S%H2186>cast<s%> off thy <S%H5695>calf<s%>, O <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>; mine <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3808>them<s%>: how long will it be ere they <S%H3201>attain<s%> to <S%H5356>innocency<s%>?

For from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is even <S%H2796>this<s%>; the workman <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H430>it<s%>, and it is no God; <S%H5695>yea<s%>, the calf of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be broken in <S%H7616>pieces<s%>.

For they <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and they shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>: he hath no <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H6780>grain<s%>; the blade shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> no <S%H7058>meal<s%>; <S%H194>if<s%> so be it <S%H6213>yield<s%>, <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall swallow it <S%H1104>up<s%>.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> is swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%>: now are they among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> as a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein none <S%H2656>delighteth<s%>.
For they are gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, like a wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> by <S%H669>himself<s%>: Ephraim hath <S%H8566>hired<s%> <S%H158>lovers<s%>.

Yea <S%H8566><s%>, though they hire among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, now will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H4592>them<s%>; and they begin to be <S%H2490>diminished<s%> by reason of the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8269>princes<s%>.
Because <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H2398>sinning<s%>, <S%H4196>altars<s%> have been unto him for <S%H2398>sinning<s%>.
I <S%H3789>wrote<s%> for him the ten thousand <S%H7230>things<s%> of my <S%H8451>law<s%>; but they are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as a strange <S%H2114>thing<s%>.

As for the <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> of mine <S%H1890>offerings<s%>, they <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>; but Jehovah <S%H7521>accepteth<s%> them <S%H2142>not<s%>: now will he remember their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%>; they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>, and <S%H1129>builded<s%> <S%H1964>palaces<s%>; and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>: but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> upon his <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the castles <S%H759>thereof<s%>.
